Facilitate users to submit feedback and bug reports directly from your webpage.

Streamlined Bug Reporting

1. Bug reporting is a hassle full of complicated steps, incomplete details, and delayed resolutions. Fusion simplifies the process, making it easy for users to submit detailed bug reports, leading to quicker issue resolutions for developers.

Advance your bug tracking and reporting

Our bug reporting feature is designed to foster collaboration among product owners, developers, and QA teams, streamlining the process from bug detection to resolution. Automatically send all relevant user data required to resolve reported bugs efficiently. 

1. Capturing & Documentation:

Annotate your screenshot(s) with colors, text, shapes, or blur for a clearer presentation of the reported bug, tailored to your preference. 

2. Metadata:

When you report a bug, our system automatically captures all related metadata and embeds it with the report, which is significant in comprehending the context. 

3. Bug tracking and user activity analysis:

The authorized person can send comments on the reported bug, feedback, and more, to which you can respond. Assign, track, change, and prioritize your bug's status independently.

Unlocking potential for every stakeholder in the app lifecycle

Empowering everyone involved throughout the lifecycle of an app, our approach focuses on unlocking the full potential for each stakeholder.

Product owners

Track success and meet satisfaction through continuous product evolution. 

Quality assurance testers

Maintain the highest quality standards to ensure a seamless user experience. 

Developers

Hunt down bugs & gain complete control over your app's performance.

Pricing

Use Fusion for free with your team or upgrade and get access to additional features at https://fusionsuite.io/pricing.html
